name: I Became the Tyrant of a Defence Game
author: Ryueun Garam &#40류은가람&#41
content: Protect the Empire was considered unbeatable for over a decade until streamer extraordinaire Mr. Gamer Geek comes along and defeats the game on its hardest mode. But just when he&#039s about to rest on his laurels, he&#039s sucked into the world of the game by some mysterious figure and thrust into Prince Ash&#039s body!Ash now realizes that every click and command he had mindlessly sent out had real, gruesome costs - including his teammates&#039 lives that he sacrificed for the sake of victory.
